description: Hari is a Full Stack Developer skilled in MERN stack, experienced in building scalable web apps with clean code and performance focus.
Experienced in frontend (JavaScript, React, Next), backend (Node.js, Express), databases (MySQL, MongoDB), and tools (Git, Postman).
6 years in IT including roles from Junior Analyst to Senior Technical Consultant across QA, development, and leadership in companies like Infoview Technologies and Perficient India.
Bachelor's degree in Software Development from St. Joseph's College, Trichy, awarded Gold Medal for academic excellence.
You can contact me in the platforms like LinkedIn, Github, Instagram etc.
I have knowledges in the domains like Fintech, E-Commerce and Healthcare.
I have worked for the clients like Sundaram Finance, Relieffactor, Ruffgreens and Johnson&Johnson.
Awarded the Extra Mile Award (2x) by Perficient and recognized as the Most Improved Performer by Infoview.
Beyond professional pursuits, enjoys the strategic aspects of Cricket, delves into new technologies, and appreciates cultural exploration through travel.
